Gold Hoarders

These commendations are unlocked when the player reaches a specific promotion, delivers specific chests or hits other targets while on voyages with the Gold Hoarders.

  • Grade II: 25 voyages

Hunting Boat Defeat enemies using a Cannon Rowboat. (25 times) Unlocks Party Boat Flintlock for purchase.
Skies of Friendship Set off fireworks while in an Alliances. Unlocks Party Boat Flag for purchase.

Warning Shot Set off a Signal Flare when another crew is nearby. Unlocks Party Boat Pegleg for purchase.
Night-Time Spectacular Set off a display of five or more fireworks at night. Unlocks Party Boat Hull and Party Boat Sails for purchase and the Night-Time Spectacular achievement.

Seat Of Thieves Take a seat at a tavern table alongside other pirates. Unlocks Party Boat Dress for purchase.
Sleepover Sleep in a bed aboard another crew's ship. Unlocks Midnight Blades Belt and Midnight Blades Shirt for purchase and the Sleepover achievement.

Welcome to our growing community of creative pirates!
Creator Crew Commendations are available for any Pirates who Stream their game via Twitch.
These accounts can be connected with the player's Xbox Account over at the Creator Crew page
